title: Host/Deploy the website on the Internet Computer
constraints: Do not modify any frontend immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (even though no code changes are requested).
Respect the existing single-actor Motoko backend architecture (even though no backend changes are requested).
nonGoals: Adding new site features or pages unrelated to deployment.
Changing the routing strategy (the app already uses hash-based routing).
Integrating third-party hosting providers (deploy to Internet Computer as described in the repo docs).
